DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate bioequivalence combination test agent , prednisolone acetate 1.0 % tobramycin 0.3 % ophthalmic suspension compare PredForte ( prednisolone acetate 1.0 % ) ophthalmic suspension . DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Tobramycin Prednisolone Acetate Compared PredForte
DOC.criteria: Bilateral cataract surgery Avoid disallow medication throughout study Contraindications use test agent Known allergy sensitivity test agent component History steroid response follow topical administration corticosteroid eye Wore contact lenses 48 hour prior Visit 1 An intraocular pressure great 22 mmHg less 5 mmHg either eye Any significant illness could expect interfere study Used ophthalmic , topical systemic corticosteroid immunomodulator 7 day prior surgery
